panels.description:
Summary of CPU usage by process $service_name.

The red line shows limit of CPUs usage for the process.

The values is indicated in Millicores. It is a special Kubernates metric means CPU core split into 1000 units.

Data comes from cloud monitoring, not always available
panels.title: CPU Usage: $pod_name

panels.description: Shows amount of successful requests to different URLs per second

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{container="$service_name", namespace="$namespace", status=~"2..", pod="$pod_name"}[$inter]) OR on() vector(0)
